Milwaukee.WTMJ-TV: WTMJ-TV, virtual channel 4 (UHF digital channel 28), is an NBC-affiliated television station licensed to Milwaukee, Wisconsin, United States. The station is owned by the E. W. Scripps Company, and is a sister station to WTMJ radio (620 AM) and WKTI (94.5 FM). The three stations share studio facilities located on Capitol Drive (Wisconsin Highway 190) in Milwaukee (an Art Deco facility that is known as "Radio City", in tribute to the New York complex of the same name); WTMJ-TV's transmitter is located approximately 4 miles (6.4 km) north of downtown Milwaukee.
